code: import React,{Component}from'react';import StatusMessage from'../statusmessage';import UserCard from'../usercard';import'./styles.css';export default class UserList extends Component{render(){const _this$props=this.props,isLoading=_this$props.isLoading,error=_this$props.error,users=_this$props.users;if(error||!users||isLoading||users.length===0){return React.createElement(StatusMessage,{error:error||!users,errorClassName:"users-error",errorMessage:error,loading:isLoading,loadingMessage:"We are fetching the users for you",nothing:users&&users.length===0,nothingMessage:"No user to display",nothingClassName:"users-error",type:"default"});}const userCardList=users.map(user=>{const name=user.name,username=user.username,avatar=user.avatar,is_staff=user.is_staff;return React.createElement("div",{key:username,className:"userCard"},React.createElement(UserCard,{username:username,name:name,avatar:avatar,isStaff:is_staff}));});return React.createElement("div",{className:"usersContainer"},userCardList);}}
